translations.translation: and those who draw out gently,
And those who undo the bonds gently,
and gently take it away;
by the angels who gently release the souls of the believers,
And who softly release the soul. (Of the believer)
By those who free briskly.
And by those who gently draw out the souls of the blessed,
and those that draw out violently,
By the meteors rushing,
and those that blow gently,
By the angels who release with gentle release.
by those who draw [it] out gently,
By those who gently draw out (the souls of the blessed);
By those (angels) who gently take out (the souls of the believers);
by the drawers (the angels of death), gently drawing (the souls of the believers),
And those who remove gently.
And [by] those who remove with ease
[79:2] by those that draw out, [by] the angels who draw out the souls of believers, gently;

(By the meteors rushing) and it is also said that He is here swearing by the angels who busy the disbelievers with grief and anxiety; it is also said that this refers to the souls of the believers which hasten to come out of their bodies in order to go to the Garden.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَٱلنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطاً } معناه النّجومُ
 ويقال: النازعاتُ والنَّاشطاتُ: النُّفوسُ تُنزعُ من أبدانها وتُنشطها نَشطاً عَنيفاً من القَدمين ويقالُ: النَّازعاتُ: القِسيّ
 والنَّاشطاتُ: الأَوهاقُ

translations.translation:
And His saying, {And the stars are actively moving} means the stars.


It is said that the nāz‘āt (souls) and the nāshiṭāt (angels) are the souls that are torn from their bodies and activated violently from their feet. It is also said that the nāz‘āt are the Qisayy (Pitchers).
 And the enlivening things: the anxieties.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَٱلنَّاشِطَاتِ } المنزعات المخرجات لنفوس أرباب المحبة والولاء المتشوقين إلى عالم العماء
 وفضاء اللاهوت { نَشْطاً } [النازعات: 2] رفقاً ولطفاً
 لكمال تحننهم وشوقهم إلى الخلاص

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { والناشطاتِ نشطاً } أي: ينشطونها ويخرجونها من الجسد من: نَشط الدلو من البئر: أخرجها
